transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello

Executive: Hanji sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapke paas?

Customer: Hanji sir, aa rahi hai.

Executive: Ha, main wohi keh raha tha ki aapne woh past lead check kara?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Toh dekhiye saat aath lead abhi aayi hui hai aapki aaj ke din mein.

Customer: Sir woh sold out hai usko

Sir sold out hai usme hum kya kar sakte hai sir aap mujhe bataye.

Executive: Aapke paas koi lead aayi.

Paanch logo ne consume kar li.
Toh isme sir hum hum kya kar sakte hai isme hume aap yeh bataye.

Kyuki isme toh aapko hi active rehna padega aur aapko hi consume karni padegi na sir.

Hello?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Ha, main yeh keh raha hu ki sold out wale mein toh sir aapko hi active rehna padega na, aapko hi consume karna padega na.

Lekin yeh sold out mein jitni bhi buylead dikh rahi hai toh aapke related hai na. Please usme aap I am interested ka ek tab hoga.

Customer: Are sir kar diya woh I am interested daba diya sab leadon mein.

Executive: Ha ha ha, please aap woh kar dijiye. Aapko buylead aayegi sir dikhegi aap please thoda sa aap active rahe.

Jitna jyada aap active rahenge sir utna jyada achi opportunity hogi aapke paas mein.

Baki aapke profile mein keywords wagera maine aapko update kar diya hai. Aapki rating wagera sir sirf aath user ne rating kari hai. Please ask your buyer to rate you.

Kyuki aaj ke time pe rating wagera bahut bahut matter karta hai sir.

Customer: Ya.

Executive: Hai na?

Toh jitni profile mein rating rahegi aapke paas mein inquiry wagera utni better aayegi.

Aur bataye sir.

Customer: Sir yahi tha bas leads se nahi aa rahi. Leads se dikkat thi na. Bohot time ho gaya na
Hun hun. Na hi yeh leads aa rahi sir. Iski requirement dali thi sir.

Executive: Sir dekhiye uske liye na abhi hum primary focus mein yahi kar sakte the ki jitne bhi aapke keyword updated hai na ek ek keyword.

Right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Us sab mein humne do do keyword update kar diya hai mostly sab mein jitne bhi hamare paas mein option mil raha tha. Un sab mein humne do do keyword update kar diya hai. Product wagera aapka pura updated hai. Toh agar humne keyword badhaya hai na toh simple sa matlab hai there is opportunity ki yeh aur jyada improve hogi aapki visibility improve hogi.

Right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Hai na? Uske accordingly sir aur jyada badhega yeh.

Right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Toh thoda bahut aur improve hoga sir for sure. Hum bhi apne taraf se pura try kar rahe hai.

Keywords wagera humne aapke profile mein update kar diya. Aapke aapki profile ka catalog quality score bahut ache se updated hai. Aapne apna catalog bahut ache se maintain kar rakha hai. Sir ek Veer Teja ji Maharaj statue karke hai iska size kya hai sir? Aap mere ko na kuch kuch isme missing hai woh mere ko aap batate jao.

Ek second hold karna.

Ek sir Sita Mata statue hai.

Hello?

Customer: Hanji sir.

Executive: Ek Sita Mata statue hai iska kya hai sir aap kitna height kitni hoti hai iski?

Customer: Sir 3 feet kar do.

Executive: 3 feet. Ek aapka aap marble Lakshmi Ganesh statue hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Iska kya iska kya size hota hai sir?

Customer: Marble Lakshmi Ganesh statue iska bhi yeh 3 feet hi rakh do sir aap.

Executive: Chalo 3 feet kar diya. Marble Lakshmi Narayan statue hai iska kya hota hai?

Customer: Marble Lakshmi Narayan statue.

Executive: Ha, yeh bhi 3 feet?

Customer: 3, 2 feet kar do, 2 feet kar do, 2 feet.

Executive: Chalo yeh 2 feet kar diya. Ek Guru Nanak statue karke hai marble ka.

Customer: Guru Nanak.

Executive: Ha iska size kitna hota hai?

Customer: Sir sir teen hi kar do.

Executive: Teen kar diya.

Marble Lakshmi Ganesh statue, marble Lakshmi statue.

Marble Nandi statue isme aapka already updated hai. Marble statue. Ha ek marble sir black marble Shiva statue hai.

Customer: Ek marble. Uska kitna size hota hai? Ha black marble ka Shiva statue.

Executive: Iska size kitna hoga 1 feet, 2 feet?

Customer: Dhai, dhai feet kar do aap dhai.

Executive: Sir ya toh 2 feet hai ya 3 feet hai.

Customer: Dhai nahi hoga sir. Itne. Ek second. Ha ho jayega. Price kya hogi sir?

Executive: Maine dhai feet kar diya iska price tha 13000.

Customer: Dhai feet kar do.

Executive: Dhai feet kar diya maine. Ek aapka hai marble Annapurna Mata statue.

Iska kya size hoga?

Customer: Yahi something hi rehta hai sir inka dhai 3 feet ke something hi rehta hai.

Executive: Iska 45000 price hai.

Customer: 45000. Hun. Annapurna wala sir main. Iska bhi teen hi kar do sir.

Executive: Chalo teen kar diya maine. Ek sir Hanuman ji statue hai. 18000 price hai.

Kitna feet hoga yeh? 3 feet.

Customer: Ha sir. Chalo. Sir yeh sir yeh catalog mein jo yeh aate hai kya naam hai iska score. Ha yeh product mein score aate hai apne isse koi fark padta hai leadon pe?

Executive: Ha sir bilkul padta hai.

Customer: Minimum score kitna hona chahiye iska?

Executive: Sir aap jitna maximum rakh sako minimum toh sir 85 hona chahiye.

Customer: Maximum. Aur sir yeh PDF isme PDF kya show karni padti hai?

Executive: Ha PDF, YouTube video aapke paas mein jo bhi hai woh sara aap dal sakte ho.

Right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Toh abhi maine kya kya kara hai main aapko bata deta hu. Aapke categories ko maine explore kar diya hai. Aapki kuch kuch product mein ek ek category updated thi. Bohot saaron mein maine do do keyword update kar diya hai. Aapke paas mein jitna bhi hai sab sab ke sab marble related keyword hi aapke profile mein updated hai. Toh brass wala aur woh wala toh ab nahi aana chahiye.

Right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: Hello? Ha sir bolo bolo. Brass wala ya dusre product wala ab nahi aana chahiye. Aayega bhi toh bahut kam aayega. Dekhiye ekdum toh 100% sahi nahi ho sakta. Lekin aayega bhi toh kam aayega.

Thik hai? Ha. Category maine aapki badha di hai. Category badhne se ho sakta hai aapke paas mein thoda online visibility badhegi. Visibility badhegi toh usi accordingly aapki inquiry wagera bhi badhegi.

Hai na?

Customer: Yes sir. Buyleads ke liye please aap active rahe. Jitna jyada buylead aap consume kar sakte hai please aap kare. Baki sir aur ek hafte baad fir baith jate hai. We will try ki main aapko kuch aur better kar pau.

Okay sir. Thik hai? Ek hafte baad ka main TBRU laga leta hu. Ek hafte baad mein fir se ek baar main baith ke na jo ho sakta hai isko hum aur thik karne ki koshish karte hai. Meanwhile sir bahut aapke product hai jisme size wagera missing hai. Toh aap kabhi laptop pe online aana toh size wagera aap please update kar dena.

Customer: Okay sir.

Executive: Thik hai? Sir yeh leadon ka dhyan rakhna sir yeh lead bahut kam aa rahi hai. Ha bilkul bilkul sir bilkul.

Customer: Bilkul sir.

Hello? Ha sir bolo ha. Ha bilkul sir main apne side se pura try karunga. Aap apne side se bas active rahe jitna aap active reh sakte hai. Thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai sir. Main aapko apna number whatsapp bhi kar deta hu. Aapko koi dikkat ho toh aap Akhtar ko connect kare. Akhtar agar phone nahi uthata ya aapko koi dikkat aati hai toh please aap mujhe bhi connect kar sakte hai.

Okay sir. Thik hai. Thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai sir.

Executive: Chaliye. Baki koi dikkat ho sir toh please aap hume batayega. Toh aapka yeh concern open ho gaya tha toh ise main close kar raha hu. Feedback ke liye jayega. Please aap feedback jarur share kijiyega.

Thik hai?

Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Customer needs assistance with updating product details.



Resolution:

- Executive updated keywords in customer's profile.

- Executive updated product sizes in the catalog.

- Executive provided his contact number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a follow-up call in a week.

- Customer needs to update missing product sizes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile update, product catalog, keywords, rating
